_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Five qualities of an ascetic not to be t: They walk too far away or too close behind.
They don’t take your bowl when it’s full.
They don’t warn you when your speech is bordering on an offense.
They keep on interrupting while you’re speaking.
Five qualities of an ascetic to be taken: They don’t walk too far away or too close behind.
They take your bowl when it is full.
They warn you when your speech is bordering on an offense.
They don’t interrupt while you’re speaking.
